title: [Large-Scale] Boundary-Crossing Collaborative Learning Design for Basic Science and Clinical Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic medical knowledge or clinical experience
context.additional_context: Provides a collaborative learning environment for medical professionals to develop integrated basic science and clinical education materials. Progresses around smartphone-based resource sharing and communication.

learning_goals: Basic science and clinical educators can collaboratively generate three or more knowledge integration strategies based on mutual professional respect.
By applying boundary-crossing mechanisms (role rotation, common language development, etc.), learners can improve the instructional material development process by over 80% in efficiency.
Based on integrated learning material development experience, learners can proactively propose similar collaborative projects within their institutions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
